biotools.summary: Identifies and catalogs the repertoire of signal transduction proteins in microbial genomes. These are identified by searching protein sequences for specific domain profiles that implicate a protein in signal transduction. It contains a host of new features and improvements including the following: draft genomes; extracytoplasmic function (ECF) sigma factor protein identification; enhanced classification of signaling proteins; among others.
